How would you construct an up-to-date README for this codebase?
Keep the README professional yet slightly humorous, focusing mainly on exposed APIs or CLI.
Include a header for each section, accompanied by matching emojis where applicable.
Provide a usage example section with code blocks demonstrating commands and expected outputs.
Include environment development instructions with straightforward code snippets, particularly for macOS using Homebrew.
Add a section detailing project setup and installation steps.
Include a section for troubleshooting common issues.
List contributors and provide instructions on how others can contribute.
